create or replace function merge_trigfunc () returns trigger language plpgsql as $$ DECLARE line text; BEGIN SELECT INTO line format('%s %s %s trigger%s',  TG_WHEN, TG_OP, TG_LEVEL, CASE  WHEN TG_OP = 'INSERT' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s', NEW)  WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s -> %s', OLD, NEW)  WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s', OLD)  END);  RAISE NOTICE '%', line; IF (TG_WHEN = 'BEFORE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW') THEN  IF (TG_OP = 'DELETE') THEN  RETURN OLD;  ELSE  RETURN NEW;  END IF; ELSE  RETURN NULL; END IF; END; $$;
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION merge_trigfunc () RETURNS trigger LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ DECLARE line text; BEGIN SELECT INTO line format('%s %s %s trigger%s',  TG_WHEN, TG_OP, TG_LEVEL, CASE  WHEN TG_OP = 'INSERT' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s', NEW)  WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s -> %s', OLD, NEW)  WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW'  THEN format(' row: %s', OLD)  END);  RAISE NOTICE '%', line; IF (TG_WHEN = 'BEFORE' AND TG_LEVEL = 'ROW') THEN  IF (TG_OP = 'DELETE') THEN  RETURN OLD;  ELSE  RETURN NEW;  END IF; ELSE  RETURN NULL; END IF; END; $$
